formElement.label: Script Location:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the start server script, including filename and extension. i.e: /path/to/startManagedServer.cmd

formElement.label: Instance Name:
formElement.documentation: Instance name of the Managed Server to start

formElement.label: Config Name:
formElement.documentation: Configuration name from which the Managed Server URL and the credentials from the Admin Server will be read.

formElement.label: Admin Server URL:
formElement.documentation: URL from the Admin Server (including protocol and port).

formElement.label: WLST Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to WLST. i.e: "/path/to/wlst.cmd" or "wlst.sh"
